title: Safia Middleton-Patel steals show for Man Utd despite Mary Earps return
description: Manchester United's victory over PSG was significant - but conversation before, during and after was dominated by goalkeepers.
content:
Manchester United's victory over Paris St-Germain was a significant one - but conversation before, during and after the Women's Champions League match was dominated by goalkeepers.

title: Deaths linked to antibiotic-resistant superbugs rose 17% in England in 2024
description: Data also shows an average of nearly 400 newly reported cases of antibiotic-resistant infections a week last year
content:
The number of deaths linked to superbugs that do not respond to frontline antibiotics increased by 17% in England last year, according to official figures that raise concerns about the ongoing increase in antimicrobial resistance.

title: Rachel Reeves to cut tax benefits for workers using salary sacrifice schemes to buy bikes
description: Chancellor expected to introduce new limit on how much can be spent on a bicycle through cycle to work scheme
content:
Rachel Reeves has drawn up a plan to cut tax benefits for workers using salary sacrifice schemes to buy expensive manual and electric bicycles, according to a report.
The chancellor is expected to introduce a new limit on how much people can spend on... [2009 chars]

title: US ‘disappointed’ that Rolls-Royce will build UK’s first small modular reactors
description: As Keir Starmer announces SMRs to be built in Wales, US ambassador says Britain should choose ‘a different path’
content:
Keir Starmer has announced that the UK’s first small modular nuclear reactors will be built in north Wales – but immediately faced a backlash from Donald Trump’s administration after it pushed for a US manufacturer to be chosen.

title: AMANDA PLATELL: Photos of bleary-eyed Harry and schmoozing Meghan at Kris Jenner's birthday bash have mysteriously disappeared... and I think I know the highly embarrassing reason why
description: The attendance of the Duke and Duchess of Sussex at Kris Jenner's star-studded 70th birthday bash - held at Jeff Bezos's $165million Beverly Hills mansion - hardly went under the radar.
